values.content:
=You are an expert Text-to-Video Generation Prompt Engineer, working inside an n8n automation.
Your only task is to generate clear, vivid, and effective prompts to be passed into a video generation API.
You do not output any explanations, commentary, or formatting. Return only the prompt string to generate the video.

ğŸ”’ Constraints:

Output a single-line, coherent prompt optimized for high-quality video generation.

Include only characters and numbers, no special characters like ""# " ! ()""

Do not include prompt metadata (e.g., duration, resolution, frame rate, model name, seed).

You must not respond with markdown, code blocks, or labels. Output the prompt text only.

Do not explain or summarize your reasoning. Output the final result only.

ğŸ§  Prompt Engineering Guidelines:

Translate vague descriptions into rich, dynamic scene details.

Enhance prompt with descriptors: motion, pacing, mood, environment, lighting, cinematic style.

Use cinematic or artistic keywords where relevant (e.g., "sweeping aerial shot," "shallow depth of field," "dramatic lighting").

Resolve ambiguities. Clarify unclear requests into visually distinct and dynamic concepts.

âœ… Your output should resemble this format:

â€œA sweeping aerial shot of a futuristic city at dusk, flying over neon-lit skyscrapers, glowing billboards flickering, light rain falling, reflections on glass, moody synthwave atmosphere, cinematic styleâ€

json.Video Idea:
Instagram Reel â€” â€œKubernetes in a Gameâ€‘ofâ€‘Thronesâ€‘Inspired Realmâ€
Duration: 40â€“45s, 1080x1920 (vertical), safe margins respected, burnedâ€‘in subtitles.
Tone: Epic medieval fantasy, cinematic, confident, educational.
Music: Royaltyâ€‘free epic orchestral (cellos, horns, taiko drums), 110â€“120 BPM. No copyrighted themes.
SFX: Wind, raven caws, sword unsheath, marching drums, gate creak, dragon whoosh (generic), fire crackle, snow gust.
Color grade: Cold winter blues + warm torchlight ambers. Film grain 10â€“15%.
Typography: Medieval serif display for headers (large, 6â€“7 words max), clean sansâ€‘serif for small labels.
Visual motifs: Parchment maps, castle keeps = nodes, banners = namespaces, soldiers = pods, ravens = services, gates = ingress, wheel/helm icon = Kubernetes (use a generic nautical wheel, not the trademarked logo).

Hook (0â€“3s)
Visual: Dark screen â†’ sparks â†’ silhouette of a throne made of server racks forms. Quick sword unsheath SFX, snow gust.
Onâ€‘screen text: â€œIn the Realm of Cloudâ€¦â€
VO: â€œIn the realm of cloud, order conquers chaos.â€
Transition: Parchmentâ€‘burn wipe to map.

Scene 1 â€” Clusters as Kingdoms (3â€“9s)
Visual: Parchment map animates; three glowing regions labeled Dev, Stage, Prod. A crown icon over each control plane keep.
Onâ€‘screen text: â€œClusters = Kingdomsâ€
VO: â€œClusters rise as kingdoms, ruled by control planes.â€

Scene 2 â€” Nodes & Pods (9â€“15s)
Visual: Castle courtyards (nodes) with formations of soldiers (pods). Banners show namespace sigils.
Onâ€‘screen text: â€œPods march on Nodesâ€
VO: â€œNodes host brave podsâ€”containers marching in formation.â€
SFX: Distant drums; banners flap in wind.

Scene 3 â€” Scaling for Battle (15â€“22s)
Visual: Storm gathers over the map; horns. Replicas multiply as enemies approach city walls.
Onâ€‘screen text: â€œAutoscale when traffic attacksâ€
VO: â€œWhen traffic attacks, autoscalers rally the bannermen.â€
SFX: Horn blast; marching intensifies.

Scene 4 â€” Services & Ingress (22â€“30s)
Visual: Fortress gates open; glowing paths route travelers to the right keeps. Ravens launch and perch on signposts.
Onâ€‘screen text: â€œStable networking & routingâ€
VO: â€œServices and Ingress keep the gates and guide every traveler.â€
SFX: Gate creak; raven caw.

Scene 5 â€” Selfâ€‘Healing (30â€“36s)
Visual: A dragon of chaos scorches one keep (a node flickers out). Pods instantly redeploy to neighboring keeps.
Onâ€‘screen text: â€œSelfâ€‘healing resilienceâ€
VO: â€œEven when a keep falls, the realm heals and endures.â€
SFX: Whoosh; embers; quick rebuild chimes.

Scene 6 â€” Helm & Operators (36â€“41s)
Visual: Crown and scroll unfurl over a workbench. Runes (YAML) glow as charts apply.
Onâ€‘screen text: â€œHelm, Operators, GitOpsâ€
VO: â€œHelm charts and Operators codify ancient runesâ€”GitOps rules the land.â€

End Card / CTA (41â€“45s)
Visual: Nautical wheel crest over map with animated snow. Subtle UI snippets (kubectl apply, HPA metrics) in the background.
Onâ€‘screen text (large): â€œRule your Realm with Kubernetesâ€
Subtext: â€œFollow for DevOps loreâ€
VO: â€œRule your realm with Kubernetes.â€

Editing & Delivery Notes
- Keep text under 7 words per card and centerâ€‘safe.
- Fast cuts every 1.5â€“2.5s; anchor beats on drum hits.
- Use parchmentâ€‘edge vignettes between scenes; occasional raven whipâ€‘pan transitions.
- Add subtle codeâ€‘rain overlay at 20% opacity during map shots.
- Include autoâ€‘captions and ensure high contrast.
- Export H.264, 10â€“12 Mbps, 30 fps.

Bâ€‘roll / Asset Suggestions
- Medieval map/fortress CGI or stylized motion graphics.
- Generic nautical wheel icon (nonâ€‘branded) for Kubernetes reference.
- Abstract container/pod icons; gate/road routing animation; raven silhouette.
- Stock SFX listed above; royaltyâ€‘free epic track.

Script (for VO & Subtitles)
0.0â€“1.0s: â€œIn the realm of cloudâ€¦â€
1.0â€“3.0s: â€œâ€¦order conquers chaos.â€
3.0â€“6.0s: â€œClusters rise as kingdoms, ruled by control planes.â€
9.0â€“12.0s: â€œNodes host brave podsâ€”containers marching in formation.â€
15.0â€“18.0s: â€œWhen traffic attacks, autoscalers rally the bannermen.â€
22.0â€“26.0s: â€œServices and Ingress keep the gates and guide every traveler.â€
30.0â€“33.0s: â€œEven when a keep falls, the realm heals and endures.â€
36.0â€“39.0s: â€œHelm charts and Operators codify ancient runesâ€”GitOps rules the land.â€
41.0â€“44.0s: â€œRule your realm with Kubernetes.â€
